There were no other sightings in Eloy on or around January 15th 2010
divs: Sighting DetailsWELL I WAS SITTING DOWN IN ONE OF THE ROOMS.ACTUALLY I ALWAYS RECORD 80'S MUSIC VIDEO'S,SO I REMEMBER WATCHING THAT.NOW FOR SOME REASON I JUST LOOKED OUTSIDE THE WINDOW.FIRST LET ME TELL YOU THIS.THERE IS A COTTON FIELD ABOUT 100 FEET AWAY FROM MY GRANDMA'S HOUSE.SO I LOOKED TOWARD THAT AND OUT FROM A TREE COMES THIS ORANGE ORB ORB.IT WAS FLYINJG OVER THE FIELDS.IT CAME OUT OF THE TREE AND THEN STARTED SPAWNING THESE OTHER LIGHT!!!!!!!!!!IT WAS SO QUICK IT LOOKED AS IT WERE SHOOTING THESE OTHER ORANGE ORBS OUT OF IT.I WENT CRAZY.I RAN OUT AND TOLD MY GRANDMA WHO WAS HANGING CLOTHES OUTSIDE.SHE DID NOT BELIEVE ME.I THEN WENT ON THE ROOF TO SEE IF IT WAS STILL FLYING.THIS OBJECT WAS AN ORANGE ORB.IT WAS NOT BRIGHT.LOST SIGHT OF THE OBJECT WHEN I RAN OUTSIDE TO REPORT IT TO MY SKEPTICAL GRANDMA :)
